pages.title: Inward
pages.text: $(bold)TYPE:$() $(l:mechanics/spells_types)Projectile$() $(br)$(bold)COST: $(spell) + $(#07735d)Ender Eye$() $(br)$(bold)MAX LEVEL:$() $(#green)1$() $(br)$(bold)XP COST:$() $(#green)16$() $(br2)$(italic)''A easy spell to make and use, when striking an entity, it will give them the 'Inward' status effect.''$()

When casting $(#3939d4)$(bold)Inward$(), a shadow projectile will be thrown from your scroll. $(br2)Upon striking another entity, it will give them the $(#3939d4)$(bold)Inward$() status effect. $(br2)This is a very useful effect for combat against other mages as it causes all of their successful spells to forcefully hit themselves. $(br2)$(bold)Tip: $(italic)The scroll is a one-time use.$()
